div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Arial,Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 339px; max-width: 184px; width: 184px; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.div:
ESP8266 based wifi connected lamp
For larger arrays supplied current must be adjusted. The max. current draw of a single WS2812B is ~60mA.
Be aware: This is a work in progress and I am no electrical engineer. Recreate at your own risk.
Author: H. Veeman
Version: 0.1 (initial untested)
